name: Big Man Broth
description:
Created as part of Ludum Dare 40

Too many cooks will spoil the broth, and more cooks are filing in by the minute. Try your best to continue cooking in the world's most demanding kitchen.

Programming: Lee Kempton, Pharez Vitalis, Rudi Prentice

Art: Shay Morris

Sound: Rudi Prentice
